name: Copper Ore
reqs: Metal Spirit and no other 'Ore' Traits.
effect: Your Natural Weapons gain _Bane_ [_Wood_]. Gain the _Copper Body_ Armor, which is Worn in addition to _Metal Spirit_. A Spirit may only have a single Trait with 'Ore' in its name.

name: Adept Manifestation
effect: You may _Manifest_ this Spirit as if it was one size smaller.

name: Shelled
reqs: Metal, Earth, Wood, or Ice Spirit, and no other [Armored] Traits.

name: Stoneborn
effect: Add [_Earth_] to all Attacks with Natural Weapons. Gain the _Stone Body_ Armor and _Earthen Reconstitution_ Ability.
